reviewText: Very good Spanish-made movie with the great Spanish movie and singing star Sarita Montiel.  The story is sort of a retread of the Camille love tragedy.  I saw this recently on a Spanish-language movie channel.  The picture quality was great.  I hope it is released very soon on US DVD.  Recommended.
waited a long time to find this movie. After I found it on line and ordered it arrived super quick
